elements.name: btdhtresolver.nodeid
elements.desc: BitTorrent Distributed Hash Table node identifier (in hex).

elements.name: ecnspider.ecnstate
elements.desc: Assertion (or negation) that ECN negotiation is enabled in the OS.

elements.name: ecnspider.initflags.fwd
elements.desc: TCP initialization flags in forward direction.

elements.name: ecnspider.synflags.fwd
elements.desc: TCP SYN flags in forward direction.

elements.name: ecnspider.initflags.rev
elements.desc: TCP initialization flags in reverse direction.

elements.name: ecnspider.synflags.rev
elements.desc: TCP SYN flags in reverse direction.

elements.name: ecnspider.ttl.rev.min
elements.desc: Minimum TTL seen in reverse direction.

elements.name: ecnspider.hostname
elements.desc: A hostname identifying a target of an active measurement.

elements.name: ecnspider.httpstatus
elements.desc: Returned http status code of a target of an active measurement.
